notes: Wallpaper: 800x480 JPG/PNG recommended. Premium touchscreen model with USB, Bluetooth, WiFi support.

configurable_options.name: account.1.display_name
configurable_options.label: Display Name
configurable_options.description: Set the phone's display name (appears on screen and in call history)

configurable_options.name: phone_setting.keyboard_lock
configurable_options.label: Enable Phone Lock
configurable_options.description: Enable the phone lock feature to prevent unauthorized use

configurable_options.name: phone_setting.keyboard_lock.type
configurable_options.label: Lock Type
configurable_options.description: Set lock type: 0=Lock all keys; 1=Lock all except dial pad; 2=Lock menu key only

configurable_options.name: phone_setting.keyboard_lock.password
configurable_options.label: Unlock PIN
configurable_options.description: Define the unlock PIN (4-15 numeric characters)

configurable_options.name: phone_setting.keyboard_lock.timeout
configurable_options.label: Auto-Lock Timeout (seconds)
configurable_options.description: Idle time in seconds before phone automatically locks (0=disabled, max=3600)

configurable_options.name: features.enhanced_dss_keys.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Enhanced DSS Keys
configurable_options.description: Enable enhanced programmable DSS (Direct Station Selection) keys with LED indicators

configurable_options.name: softkey.1.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Menu Softkey
configurable_options.description: Show or hide the Menu softkey on the touchscreen interface

configurable_options.name: softkey.1.label
configurable_options.label: Menu Softkey Label
configurable_options.description: Custom label for the menu softkey

configurable_options.name: static.security.admin_password
configurable_options.label: Admin Password
configurable_options.description: Change default admin password for web/phone interface (Required for security)

configurable_options.name: static.network.web_server.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Web Interface
configurable_options.description: Enable/disable the web configuration interface (disable for total lockdown)

configurable_options.name: static.zero_touch.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Zero Touch
configurable_options.description: Enable automatic provisioning on boot (disable to prevent accidental provisioning)

configurable_options.name: screensaver.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Screensaver
configurable_options.description: Activate screensaver after idle timeout

configurable_options.name: screensaver.wait_time
configurable_options.label: Screensaver Wait Time (seconds)
configurable_options.description: Idle time before screensaver activates (60-3600 seconds)

configurable_options.name: screensaver.type
configurable_options.label: Screensaver Type
configurable_options.description: Select screensaver display mode

configurable_options.name: account.1.hotline_number
configurable_options.label: Hotline Number
configurable_options.description: Enable hotline/auto-dial feature (phone will dial this number automatically)

configurable_options.name: account.1.hotline_delay
configurable_options.label: Hotline Delay (seconds)
configurable_options.description: Delay before auto-dialing hotline number (0=immediate, 4=wait 4 seconds)

configurable_options.name: phone_setting.inter_digit_timer
configurable_options.label: Inter Digit Timer (seconds)
configurable_options.description: Wait time after last digit before auto-dialing (1-14 seconds)

configurable_options.name: features.bluetooth.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Bluetooth
configurable_options.description: Enable Bluetooth for headsets and mobile device pairing

configurable_options.name: features.wifi.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable WiFi
configurable_options.description: Enable WiFi connectivity (T58G with WiFi module only)

configurable_options.name: phone_setting.time_zone
configurable_options.label: Time Zone
configurable_options.description: Set phone time zone offset from UTC

configurable_options.name: account.1.codec.1.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Codec G.722
configurable_options.description: Enable high-definition audio codec G.722

configurable_options.name: account.1.codec.2.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Codec PCMU
configurable_options.description: Enable standard audio codec PCMU (G.711μ)

configurable_options.name: account.1.codec.3.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Codec PCMA
configurable_options.description: Enable standard audio codec PCMA (G.711a)

configurable_options.name: account.1.codec.4.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Codec G.729
configurable_options.description: Enable low-bandwidth codec G.729
